attributes.action: Stop Oversaes Aid until we are on our feet
attributes.additional_details:
It is time to stop overseas aid until this country is back on its feet. Aid should not be given to any country that has nuclear weapons or space programme or massive armed forces.
The money given to aid should go to getting our country and its people on its feet and then start up overseas aid however not if they have the above weaponry and armed forces etc. All aid must be seen to be going to the people and not to the corrupt governments this must be ensured prior to any aid.
